content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your interest in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering the prime location and condition of this newly built apartment, my aim is to secure the most affordable rate. I would like to propose starting the negotiation with a monthly rent slightly below the advertised price to see if we can reach an agreement.

If the other party accepts this initial proposal, I would gladly accept 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' with a favorable price for me. However, if they don't consider this offer, I might need to reconsider other options or adjust my expectations. In such a scenario, I would respond with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the landlord seems inflexible with price adjustments.' Ultimately, if a fair price is found, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE', and if not, it will also end due to the lack of an agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
